resources.string: For the perfect walking holiday in Ireland come join us in the heart of walking in Wicklow.\n\nThe picturesque village of Tinahely is just over an hour from Dublin. Blessed with some of Ireland’s most beautiful landscapes, hills and mountains, it is no wonder that it is also one of Ireland’s favourite walking destinations and as part of Discover Ireland’s Walkers Welcome programme, Tinahely is focused on making your walking holiday a pleasure.
Grade: Strenuous / Length: 28km / Time: 6 hours / Format: Loop / Ascent: 350m

Restaurant/Café Modern Irish restaurant serving lunch and dinner five days a week
Restaurant open to public with a traditional menu. Serving breakfast, lunch and dinner
Award-winning pub-restaurant delivering exceptional quality, value, and service along with fine food and beverages.
Ideal for breakfasts, hot/cold lunches and afternoon teas, and offers a tempting array of home cooked cuisine of sandwiches, quiches, tarts, scones, cookies and pastries.
Enjoy the very best in traditional Irish cuisine. Only the freshest home-grown ingredients go into the great baking and scrumptious flavour that have made us a favourite destination for all foodies
Wicklow’s longest established professional Arts Venue for music, theatre, visual art, film, literature, comedy, and dance.
